# 暗黑模式下，Modal不生效

`unconfirmed`

### Reproduction link

[![Edit on CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/static/img/play-codesandbox.svg)](https://codesandbox.io/s/jing-tai-que-ren-dui-hua-kuang-antd-5-9-0-forked-4yc3tk)

### Steps to reproduce

暗黑模式下，点击按钮打开弹窗，深色背景未生效

### What is expected?

弹窗背景为暗黑模式背景

### What is actually happening?

仍为浅色背景

| Environment | Info        |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| antd        | 5.9.0       |
| React       | 18.0.0      |
| System      | macos13.2.1 |
| Browser     | chrome      |

---

不清楚是故意设计，还是bug
